text: Hi everyone. First, I want to thank our
friend at Abic for inviting me here
today. As you can probably tell, I'm a
little nervous being on stage in
English. But I was even more nervous
when I first joined Info Games to create
Infinity Nikki, our most ambitious
project yet. Let me share a story with
you. Our journey began in 2012 with just
four people. He had a games released
before starting Infinity Nikki in 2021
and we still update all of them today.
This were mobile only games focus on
dress up and interactive story game
play. We could have stayed comfortably
in that space but we didn't want to. We
want to create a life beyond
amazing. That means crafting new
experience no one has ever imagined.
That means pushing far beyond current
generation technology to develop game
that not only looks stunning but stay
emotionally touching for years to come.
That means Infinite Nikki our first and
real engine five crossplatform game with
over 20 million download at launch
largely driven by
mobile. We began ideating during the
pandemic. Infinity is about finding a
peace in a cozy open world bringing
happiness to everyone. Dress up is not
just for style. It's a way to interact
with a lively world along or with
friend. From a technology view, our
pillars should man impossible things at
once. High fidelity graphics that
supports outfit customization even in
corporate mode with over 1,000 outfit
parts and more than 100 color
character. A huge map full of fine
details for deep beauty. Perfect for
close-up camera shot. And it must run
smoothly on our platform for all
players. Big goals. We had never
launched a crossplatform game before,
but we promised our community, our
partner and Nikki that we will give it
our all. Yes, it were crazy. A real
engine is about making crazy idea real.
We had a debate. Even I hesitated it.
But with a real engine f in Nikki's
vision come to life. Lumin gave us movie
quality lighting in real time. Open
world tools like wood partition help our
team of over 1,000 people create stay
creative and work well together.
Arranging files new rendering help our
team bring amazing virtuals to mobile
devices. Thanks to Epic support, we made
it happen. Now let's take a look at the
open world. We want to make a detailed
exciting world for player to explore.
Our first map covers 400 square
kilometers with dense vegetation and a
dynamic ecosystem. We had to make sure
memory and performance were never
compromised especially on mobile and
real engine let us build a crossplatform
GPU rendering system with smart GPU
coloring and the level of detail
control. Jo and triangle staying budget
on all devices. You may wonder why we
put so much care into these details. I
want to share a fan story that shows
what Unreal Engine 5 means for our
players beyond outfits and open world.
This is a true story from our fan child.
My mom and I play Infinity Nikki
differently. She reads every item
description, smiles when Nikki jumps,
and changes into a pretty blue outfit.
It does not matter if she finishes the
platforming.
When I was finally able to take her on a
long-distance trip, she spent hours
picking dresses and took many photos,
even of a small flower by the road. Now
I understand. My mom loves every small
moment. We play Infinity Nikki in
different ways, but we love each other
the same.
We hope you'll enjoy this story. Hope
you find the omen of the world's beauty
in Infinite Nikki, the coziest open
world game for OV1. Thank you for your
time and have an amazing and real
fast. Thank you everyone.
